nodes.text: A male Nothoiin officer within the Galactic Empire was distantly related to a baron of the Anoat sector's Noble Court. At some point during the Imperial blockade of the sector, he stated his intention to join the Noble Court, offering crystals as proof of his good faith.
The Smuggler, a friend of the Noble Court, dispatched some of their crewmembers to determine the Nothoiin's sincerity.
